text: Mary Boio Fowler (born 14 February 2003) is an Australian soccer player. She plays for Manchester City in the FA Women's Super League and the Australia women's national soccer team (nicknamed the "Matildas"). == Career statistics == === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Adelaide United 2019–20 W-League 7 3 — — — 7 3 Montpellier HSC 2019–20 D1 Féminine 1 0 0 0 — — 1 0 2020–21 D1 Féminine 22 5 1 0 — — 23 5 2021–22 D1 Féminine 17 5 1 0 — — 18 5 Total 40 10 2 0 — — 42 10 Manchester City 2022–23 Women's Super League 11 1 3 0 6 4 2 0 22 5 2023–24 Women's Super League 21 4 3 2 6 0 — 30 6 2024–25 Women's Super League 1 0 0 0 0 0 2 1 3 1 Total 33 5 6 1 12 4 4 1 55 12 Career total 80 18 8 1 12 4 4 1 104 25 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National Team Year Apps Goals Australia 2018 3 0 2019 1 0 2020 0 0 2021 16 5 2022 12 4 2023 16 4 2024 9 2 Total 57 15 :Scores and results list Australia's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Fowler goal.
